page.title: 04COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: { POSTAL CODES, POST OFFICE, MAIL. Today we visited the Berry Hill Industrial Estate.We noticed that the Postal Delivery Office was on the Estate.We went to look around.As we entered the public visitors room we found it was like a jail keeping the mail safe.A man came to the door and showed us a postcode book.He explained that the first three numbers were the area postcode and the last three were the street numbers.For instance the Droitwich postcode is WR9.Hampton Lovett Farm -WR9 OWL, Thatchers Piece, Boycott - WR9 9EF and Rashwood Farm - WR9 OBW. All the mail for Droitwich comes from Worcester.At Droitwich it is sorted into areas and streets using the postcode.
